titleInfo.title: Roy Acuff and Wesley Rose Interview by Chet Hagan in 1980 Side Two

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame© and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: The recording is an interview of Roy Acuff and Wesley Rose by Chet Hagan. The recording takes place on November 14th, 1980.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
